II.iii.1.A.4.b
.
When to Place an Application for Benefits Under EP Control
Do
not
establish EP control for an application for benefits unless it is substantially complete.
References
:  For more information on
criteria for a substantially complete application, see
38 CFR 3.159(a)(3)
38 CFR 3.160(a)
, and
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 1.A.4.f
, and
notification requirements for an incomplete application, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Applications for Benefits
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
